item.title: Commands help?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

if(command.startsWith("spec") && playerRights > 1){ specialAmount += 100; specAttack(); }

I always use >= equal to or greater.

edit 2:
It’s in item.cfg.

Its something named like that anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Commands help?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Edit: ahh, memories…

hey guys, so im trying to add a ::spec command for mods to recharge spec. here’s my code:

if(command.startsWith("spec") && playerRights > 1){ specialAmount += 100; specAttack(); }

but when i compiled and ran the server, it didnt seem to work, and didnt recharge the spec. any ideas on how to fix this?

edit: i forgot to mention that this problem happens with ::hail and ::blowjob too… it was at the owner’s name so i set it to playerRights > 1 so mods can use it but it wont work.

edit 2: i fixed it, i realised it was greater than, but not equal LOL. but now i have some other problems… i am trying to change some weapon stats like vls and stuff, but i dont know where the file is. i tried searching but it says “you cannot enter this post because you don’t have the permission to do so” or something like that. help?

Read full topic
